The generation condition of the extraction is given: If Light_source is Solar or Solar Simulator, Lamp is always Solar Simulator.

evidence.pdf_reference: the CCPC process requires the immobilization of CuO on commercially available substrates such as glass fibers, which offers a homogeneous surface exposure, efficient absorption of solar energy, and an easy application in reactors.In this work, the fabrication of CuO coatings on glass fibers by a simple microwave-hydrothermal method to produce solar fuels (CH 3 OH and HCOH) in CCPC process is proposed.Three glass fibers with different chemical compositions and slit (open area) were selected as supports.The
